alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 20 at 2:25PM AKDT until October 22 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will cause low visibility and make travel very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting to 50 mph are causing visibility of one half mile or less in blowing snow. The strong winds and blowing will continue through early Sunday. The strongest winds and worst conditions will be now through Saturday. Winds will gradually decrease Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
